languages.text: {n}Ульфар склоняется к вам и с дружелюбной, лишь самую малость кровожадной улыбкой произносит:{/n} "Ты же не будешь болтать об этом направо и налево, верно?"
{n}Ulfar leans toward you, and with a friendly, only slightly feral grin, says,{/n} "Should what I told you reach other ears, I shall take your tongue."
languages.original_text: {n}Ульфар склоняется к вам и с дружелюбной, лишь самую малость кровожадной улыбкой произносит:{/n} "Ты же не будешь болтать об этом направо и налево, верно?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar leans toward you, and with a friendly, only slightly feral grin, says,{/n} "What I told you, you won't go bandying it about, will you?"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar leans toward you, and with a friendly, only slightly feral grin, says,{/n} "What I told you, you won't go bandying it about, will you?"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar leans toward you, and with a friendly, only slightly feral grin, says,{/n} "What I told you, you won't go bandying it about, will you?"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar leans toward you, and with a friendly, only slightly feral grin, says,{/n} "Should what I told you reach other ears, I shall take your tongue."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}乌尔法朝你靠了过来，脸上挂着友好而又略带野性的笑容。{/n}“要是这些话传到了别人耳朵里，我就把你的舌头扯下来。”
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar leans toward you, and with a friendly, only slightly feral grin, says,{/n} "Should what I told you reach other ears, I shall take your tongue."

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法朝你靠了过来，脸上挂着友好而又略带野性的笑容。{/n}“我告诉你的这些事情，你不会到外面乱说，对吧？”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar se inclina hacia ti y con una sonrisa amistosa y solo un poco salvaje, te dice:{/n} «Si lo que le he contado alcanza oídos ajenos, le arrancaré la lengua».
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar leans toward you, and with a friendly, only slightly feral grin, says,{/n} "Should what I told you reach other ears, I shall take your tongue."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar se inclina hacia ti y con una sonrisa amistosa y solo un poco salvaje, te dice:{/n} «No vaya contando por ahí lo que acabo de relatarle, ¿de acuerdo?».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}ウルファーはこちらに身を乗り出して、親しげに、だけど少し野獣じみた笑顔を浮かべて言う。{/n}「もし俺の話を他の奴に言ったら、その口を塞いでやるからな」
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar leans toward you, and with a friendly, only slightly feral grin, says,{/n} "Should what I told you reach other ears, I shall take your tongue."

traits.locale_text: {n}ウルファーはこちらに身を乗り出して、親しげに、だけど少し野獣じみた笑顔を浮かべて言う。{/n}「もし俺の話を他の奴に言ったら、その口を塞いでやるからな」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar neigt sich zu dir vor und sagt mit einem freundlichen, nur ein ganz klein wenig wildem Grinsen:{/n} "Sollte das, was ich Euch gesagt habe, andere Ohren erreichen, hole ich mir Eure Zunge."
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar leans toward you, and with a friendly, only slightly feral grin, says,{/n} "Should what I told you reach other ears, I shall take your tongue."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar neigt sich zu dir vor und sagt mit einem freundlichen, nur ein ganz klein wenig wildem Grinsen:{/n} "Ihr werdet doch gewiss nicht herumerzählen, was ich Euch gesagt habe, nicht wahr?"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar se penche vers vous et, avec un sourire amical et un peu moins sauvage que d'habitude, vous murmure :{/n} « Si ce que je viens de vous raconter venait à s'ébruiter, je n'hésiterais pas à vous arracher la langue. »
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar leans toward you, and with a friendly, only slightly feral grin, says,{/n} "Should what I told you reach other ears, I shall take your tongue."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar se penche vers vous, et avec un sourire amical et un peu moins sauvage que d'habitude, vous murmure :{/n} « Ce que je viens de vous raconter, vous n'allez pas le répéter partout, n'est-ce pas ? »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar leans toward you, and with a friendly, only slightly feral grin, says,{/n} "Should what I told you reach other ears, I shall take your tongue."

languages.text: {n}Ulfar, dostane ve kısmen vahşi bir gülümsemeyle sana doğru eğilip konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Söylediklerim başkalarının kulağına giderse dilini keserim."
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar leans toward you, and with a friendly, only slightly feral grin, says,{/n} "Should what I told you reach other ears, I shall take your tongue."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar dostane ve kısmen vahşi bir gülümsemeyle sana doğru eğilip konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Söylediklerim başkalarının kulağına giderse senin dilini keserim."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
